title: A sound problem!
content: I have a weird problem! When i connect a Bluetooth speaker to my laptop, any browser i open to watch a video, i can hear the sound through the bt speaker, but when i open Firefox, the sound is coming through the laptop speakers!! i tried to change something in sound settings, but nothing is working! I even bought another speaker, i thought the speaker is the problem, but its not!

title: Why am I updating twice in one week? I still can't get links in the current page to switch to a new tab.
content: Now I'm being blocked from making comments in Facebook. Fire fox will create a new tab for a link in the page but does not switch to it. I have tried every switch and add-in I can find to change this but they all same the same thing. Create a new tab but do not switch to it. he same thing happens when I'm in Thunderbird. I click on a link in a Email and it creates the new tab in Firefox but does not switch to Firefox. It just sits there. I have to manually switch to Firefox. I just updates to day 8-8-25 but no change. Firefox 141.0.3

title: Delete history by days right from history panel
content:
Hello. I have an issue with history panel.

In previous of Firefox the history, split by date, each day's block used to have it's own actions: it had a context menu with "Delete" item. Also it was possible to put focus on some day, press Delete button on keyboard and to get all items of this day removed from the history.

Since version 141 it is not possible.

Please get this opportunity back.

title: Recently got a windows pop up after clicking on a sports stream.  It was asking to allow firefox.exe through windows firewall.  Is my computer in danger?
content:
I did not click to allow it through the firefall. The firefox I was using was connecting to the internet fine. (Despite the pop up saying it was blocked on both private and public networks.)

I can guess the video player app is being used in some kind of attack.

The link I clicked on. https://streamed.pk/watch/carolina-panthers-vs-cleveland-browns-2261156/admin/1

Btw I googled this and saw others complaining about it but basically no info.
